title: Chilli con Carne with Chocolate
ingredients: ['450g extra lean minced beef (5-10% fat)', '1 onion, chopped', '250ml hot water', '2 (400g) tins chopped tomatoes with garlic, undrained', '1 (410g) tin kidney beans, rinsed and drained', '1 (410g) tin black beans, rinsed and drained', '2 (198g) tins sweetcorn niblets, drained', '55g plain chocolate, chopped', '2 teaspoons chilli powder', '1 tablespoon ground cumin', '1/2 teaspoon dried oregano', '1 teaspoon salt']
